Source file src/github.com/bnb-chain/greenfield-go-sdk/examples/permission.go

Documentation: github.com/bnb-chain/greenfield-go-sdk/examples 

     1  package main
     2  
     3  import (
     4  	"context"
     5  	"log"
     6  
     7  	"github.com/bnb-chain/greenfield-go-sdk/client"
     8  	"github.com/bnb-chain/greenfield-go-sdk/pkg/utils"
     9  	"github.com/bnb-chain/greenfield-go-sdk/types"
    10  	permTypes "github.com/bnb-chain/greenfield/x/permission/types"
    11  	sdk "github.com/cosmos/cosmos-sdk/types"
    12  )
    13  
    14  // it is the example of basic permission SDKs usage
    15  // the storage example need to run before permission examples to make sure the resources has been created
    16  func main() {
    17  	// you need to set the principal address in config.go to run this examples
    18  	if len(principal) < 42 {
    19  		log.Println("please set principal if you need run permission test")
    20  		return
    21  	}
    22  	granteeAddr, err := sdk.AccAddressFromHexUnsafe(principal)
    23  	if err != nil {
    24  		log.Fatalf("principal addr invalid %v", err)
    25  	}
    26  
    27  	principalStr, err := utils.NewPrincipalWithAccount(granteeAddr)
    28  	if err != nil {
    29  		log.Fatalf("fail to generate marshaled principal %v", err)
    30  	}
    31  
    32  	account, err := types.NewAccountFromPrivateKey("test", privateKey)
    33  	if err != nil {
    34  		log.Fatalf("New account from private key error, %v", err)
    35  	}
    36  	cli, err := client.New(chainId, rpcAddr, client.Option{DefaultAccount: account})
    37  	if err != nil {
    38  		log.Fatalf("unable to new greenfield client, %v", err)
    39  	}
    40  
    41  	// put bucket policy
    42  	bucketActions := []permTypes.ActionType{
    43  		permTypes.ACTION_UPDATE_BUCKET_INFO,
    44  		permTypes.ACTION_DELETE_BUCKET,
    45  	}
    46  	ctx := context.Background()
    47  	statements := utils.NewStatement(bucketActions, permTypes.EFFECT_ALLOW, nil, types.NewStatementOptions{})
    48  
    49  	policyTx, err := cli.PutBucketPolicy(ctx, bucketName, principalStr, []*permTypes.Statement{&statements},
    50  		types.PutPolicyOption{})
    51  	handleErr(err, "PutBucketPolicy")
    52  	_, err = cli.WaitForTx(ctx, policyTx)
    53  	if err != nil {
    54  		log.Fatalln("txn fail")
    55  	}
    56  	log.Printf("put bucket %s policy sucessfully, principal is: %s.\n", bucketName, principal)
    57  
    58  	// get bucket policy
    59  	policyInfo, err := cli.GetBucketPolicy(ctx, bucketName, principal)
    60  	handleErr(err, "GetBucketPolicy")
    61  	log.Printf("bucket: %s policy info:%s\n", bucketName, policyInfo.String())
    62  
    63  	// verify permission
    64  	effect, err := cli.IsBucketPermissionAllowed(ctx, principal, bucketName, permTypes.ACTION_DELETE_BUCKET)
    65  	handleErr(err, "IsBucketPermissionAllowed")
    66  
    67  	if effect != permTypes.EFFECT_ALLOW {
    68  		log.Fatalln("permission not allowed to:", principal)
    69  	}
    70  
    71  	// delete bucket policy
    72  	policyTx, err = cli.DeleteBucketPolicy(ctx, bucketName, principalStr, types.DeletePolicyOption{})
    73  	handleErr(err, "DeleteBucketPolicy")
    74  	_, err = cli.WaitForTx(ctx, policyTx)
    75  	if err != nil {
    76  		log.Fatalln("txn fail")
    77  	}
    78  
    79  	// put object policy
    80  	objectActions := []permTypes.ActionType{
    81  		permTypes.ACTION_DELETE_OBJECT,
    82  		permTypes.ACTION_GET_OBJECT,
    83  	}
    84  	statements = utils.NewStatement(objectActions, permTypes.EFFECT_ALLOW, nil, types.NewStatementOptions{})
    85  	policyTx, err = cli.PutObjectPolicy(ctx, bucketName, objectName, principalStr, []*permTypes.Statement{&statements},
    86  		types.PutPolicyOption{})
    87  	handleErr(err, "PutObjectPolicy")
    88  	_, err = cli.WaitForTx(ctx, policyTx)
    89  	if err != nil {
    90  		log.Fatalln("txn fail")
    91  	}
    92  	log.Printf("put object: %s policy sucessfully, principal is: %s.\n", objectName, principal)
    93  
    94  	// get object policy
    95  	policyInfo, err = cli.GetObjectPolicy(ctx, bucketName, objectName, principal)
    96  	handleErr(err, "GetObjectPolicy")
    97  	log.Printf("object: %s policy info:%s\n", bucketName, policyInfo.String())
    98  
    99  	// verify permission
   100  	effect, err = cli.IsObjectPermissionAllowed(ctx, principal, bucketName, objectName, permTypes.ACTION_DELETE_OBJECT)
   101  	handleErr(err, "IsObjectPermissionAllowed")
   102  
   103  	if effect != permTypes.EFFECT_ALLOW {
   104  		log.Fatalln("permission not allowed to:", principal)
   105  	}
   106  
   107  	// delete object permission
   108  	policyTx, err = cli.DeleteObjectPolicy(ctx, bucketName, objectName, principalStr, types.DeletePolicyOption{})
   109  	handleErr(err, "DeleteObjectPolicy")
   110  }
   111  

Build version go1.19.10.
